generalComment.value:
For this LCA study, specific data (primary data) were used for processes within the Pinto plant in Polla (SA) and the Polesine plant (PR) (Core). Therefore, specific data are all the quantities of raw materials used, energy consumption, waste, and emissions concerning the shutter production cycle, data supplied directly by the company. Specific data are the distances calculated by the suppliers of the raw materials
used and the means of transport used to transport them to the factory (primary data).  
Where generic data were used (e.g. for the schematisation of production processes associated with the various input materials), they were chosen to be representative for the area geographical area (Italy) and the reference technology. The generic data used for the calculation, i.e. the schematisations of the various products/processes within the calculation software, refer instead to databases updated in the last 10 years, as required by the PCRs. 



In the study, input and output data were allocated between the different processes while maintaining the
principle of modularity: materials and energy flows to and from the environment are then assigned to the module in which they occur. According to the same criterion, no double counting was carried out counting for both input and output flows.
The allocation criteria adopted for the LCA model comply with the reference standards (EN 15804, ISO 14044).

The inventory data considered in the study represent at least 95% of the total inflows (mass and energy) to upstream processes, core processes and downstream processes.

technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse.value:
Aluminium roller blind profile with environmentally friendly polyurethane foam with high stability and long life.
The roller shutter has a standard specific weight of approx. 5.0 kg/sqm. The reference flow equal to the weight of the product plus that of the packaging is approximately 5.3 kg/sqm. This product is sometimes shipped as a semi-finished product to the Polesine site, where only the shutter cutting and assembly process is carried out. At that site, the packaging of the finished product is also carried out.
